item.description:
Dear Boston Karaoke Meetup Members:

Announcing the November Boston Karaoke Meetup for 2012.

We have the Karaoke Lounge reserved just for us from 6-9PM. Courtside has over 70,000 karaoke songs in its library for you to choose from.  We will have Mark the Shark as our KJ host and he always tries to do a good job.

I am going to continue using Paypal to collect the fees in advance.  People did not have to worry about paying at the event and that makes it easier for everyone concerned.  I apologize to those who find it difficult paying in advance.

I am disabling guests to make sure I can create a Name Tag for everyone.  If you have a guest, please have them register and RSVP for themselves.  Make sure your name and photo on the Meetup Website are correct to drive proper Name Tag creation.

I am limiting the number of attendees to only 18 this month, so to make sure you have  a spot, please sign up early.

Your Karaoke Host,
-Phil

PS. I am planning for the next Karaoke Meetup on December 1st, 2012.
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be in the back with the Karaoke machine or call me at 617-429-6571
item.name: Boston Karaoke Meetup - November 2012
